summary: This module coordinates the execution of Ansible unit tests using pytest. It prepares the testing environment, enforces supported Python version constraints, installs required dependencies, configures coverage collection, and creates specialized contexts tailored to the type of content under test (e.g., HTML, JSON, XML). The core class encapsulates setup and teardown logic, while the module entry point triggers the test run.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, automated way for developers to run Ansible unit tests across various content types and Python versions, ensuring proper environment configuration, dependency management, and coverage reporting.
